sentences.en: Even leaf, brick, shingle and blade of grass is fresh - washed and shining.
sentences.cn: 就连树叶 、 砖瓦 、 小石子和草叶子都被冲刷得那么干净,熠熠生辉.

sentences.en: Every leaf , brick , shingle and blade of grass is fresh - washed and shining.
sentences.cn: 每片树叶, 每块砖瓦乃至一 叶小草,都被洗刷一新,闪闪发光.

sentences.en: Every leaf, brick, shingle and of grass is fresh - washed and shining.
sentences.cn: 每一片树叶, 每一块砖瓦和鹅卵石,每一片草地,都洗刷一新,闪闪发光.

sentences.en: He hung out grandfather's shingle, and waited for opportunity to knock.
sentences.cn: 他挂出了祖父的行医招牌, 等机会来敲门.

sentences.en: He hung out his grandfather's shingle.
sentences.cn: 他挂出了祖父的行医招牌。

sentences.en: I prefer a sandy beach to a shingle one.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢沙滩,不喜欢遍布小石子的海滩.

sentences.en: On this beach there's too much shingle and not enough sand.
sentences.cn: 在这个海滩上,圆卵石太多,沙太少.

sentences.en: She cut the hair in a shingle.
She sighed slightly as she sat on shingle in the sunshine.
sentences.cn: 阳光下,他坐在屋瓦上轻声地叹气.

sentences.en: Straight ahead beyond a narrow shingle ofbeach, the water beckoned to her.
sentences.cn: 正前方的狭窄的河岸后面, 水波正向她呼唤.

sentences.en: The boat grounded on a shingle bank.
sentences.cn: 船在铺满圆卵石的海滩上搁浅了.

sentences.en: the crash of waves on the shingle
The doctor hung out his shingle at the beginning of this year.
sentences.cn: 这位医生今年年初挂牌开业了.

sentences.en: Then he scraped away the dirt, and exposed a pine shingle.
sentences.cn: 接着他刨去泥土, 下面露出一块松木瓦块.

sentences.en: They lapped one shingle over another in laying a roof.
sentences.cn: 他们在铺房顶时,使瓦互相搭接起来.

sentences.en: We listened to the rain on the shingle roof.
sentences.cn: 我们听着雨水打在屋顶的木瓦上.

words.tran_cn: 小石子多的；多卵石的；多碎石的
覆盖作用；叠瓦构造；压挤熟铁块
用墙面板装修；使叠盖（shingle的ing形式）
墙面板；[建]木瓦；小招牌（尤指医生或律师挂的营业招牌）；鹅卵石

trans.tran_en: small round pieces of stone on a beach
